title: Chapter 1746 - Ushering In A Divine Son
body:
Chapter 1746 - Ushering In A Divine Son

The Divine Fortune Teller suddenly stopped in place, and his thin, aged frame stiffened.

The Spherical Heavens Immortal Sovereign exclaimed, “And here I thought a mouse was hiding in the corner. So, it was you, you old scam artist!”

His golden eyes bore into the Divine Fortune Teller as if trying to figure out what he was doing here.

The Divine Fortune Teller laughed coldly. “When did I ever scam you, Spherical Heavens? If you don’t have any other business, hurry up and step aside. I have no desire to get mixed up in these turbid waters.”

The Zhuyou Great Peng was speechless. Even it could tell that the old fortune teller was putting on a strong front. He’s acting tough, but he’s obviously scared shitless!

The Spherical Heavens Immortal Sovereign said expressionlessly, “You’re already here. How could you think of leaving? Come on, come with me.”

With that, he walked toward the ritual ground built in the distance.

The Divine Fortune Teller’s expression filled with uncertainty.

“If you dare run, don’t blame me for being merciless. I’ll break your legs if I have to!” the Spherical Heavens Immortal Sovereign said without so much as turning his head.

The Divine Fortune Teller took a deep breath, then steeled himself. He laughed coldly, “It’s...
original_title: Chapter 1746 - Ushering in a Divine Son
